Below are the files used for an Introduction to `R` workshop given at Simon Fraser University on Tuesday, March 3rd, 2020, in conjunction with the Psychology Graduate Student Caucus. Due to time constraints, emphasis is placed on what `R` can do.

To download all of the files in one convenient archive, please [click here to download StartR.zip](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/StartR.zip).

Individual listings:

* [0-RunFirst.R](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/0-RunFirst.R)
* [1-IntroR.pdf](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/1-IntroR.pdf)
* [2a-Reproducible_Research1.Rmd](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/2a-Reproducible_Research1.Rmd)
* [2a-Reproducible_Research2.Rmd](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/2a-Reproducible_Research2.Rmd)
    * [perfect.csv](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/perfect.csv)
* [2b-APA_Style.zip](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/2b-APA_Style.zip)
* [3-R_Packages_and_Support.Rmd](https://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/3-R_Packages_and_Support.Rmd)

Please feel to send comments or questions to me at [msigal@sfu.ca](mailto:msigal@sfu.ca).
